amendment.description: To reauthorize the diesel emissions reduction program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3143 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3143 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Carper to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S482-484; text: CR S483) To reauthorize the diesel emissions reduction program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3143 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
